title: @Riot - Thanks for listening to Super Galaxy Kindred feedback!
body: While it's not active yet, they did actually listen and add proper sounds effects to their AA and W. This was asked for the other day and they actually went through with it! THANK YOU SKINS TEAM!!

replies.body:
As always, thank ***you*** guys for taking the time to leave feedback! While we may not be able to accommodate all feedback ,we do hear you out and make changes when we can/when we feel it could make the skin even better.

http://img03.deviantart.net/6be2/i/2012/279/6/f/high_five__by_duiliogiordano-d5gzpvx.jpg

*(Art by DuilioGiordano)*
Yaaaaaaas... Super stoked for Super Galaxy Kindred. I'll have to play her mid, jungle and bot lol
